de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.im.manager.simple

Class DefaultImvManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.im.manager.AbstractImManager<org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv.IMV>
      • de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.im.manager.simple.DefaultImvManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImAdapterManager<ImvAdapter>, ImManager<org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv.IMV>, ImvManager

    public class DefaultImvManager
extends AbstractImManager<org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv.IMV>
implements ImvManager
    Default IMV manager, that manages IMV and its associated adapters.

    • Nested Class Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • DefaultImvManager

        public DefaultImvManager(ImMessageRouter router,
                 ImvAdapterFactory adapterFactory,
                 TncsAdapterFactory tncsFactory)
        Creates a default IMV manager with the given message router, IMV adapter factory and TNCS adapter factory. The factories are used to create the necessary adapters for every IMV. The manager has a maximum IMV ID limit of (reserved IMV ID ANY - 1).
        Parameters:
        router - the message router
        adapterFactory - the IMV adapter factory
        tncsFactory - the TNCS adapter factory

      • DefaultImvManager

        public DefaultImvManager(ImMessageRouter router,
                 ImvAdapterFactory adapterFactory,
                 TncsAdapterFactory tncsFactory,
                 long maxImId)
        Creates a default IMV manager with the given message router, IMV adapter factory and TNCS adapter factory. The factories are used to create the necessary adapters for every IMV. The The maximum IMV ID limit is set by the maximum IMV ID parameter.
        Parameters:
        router - the message router
        adapterFactory - the IMV adapter factory
        tncsFactory - the TNCS adapter factory
        maxImId - the IMV ID limit
